name: WickedPeppers
0:
”Alexa, ask Wicked Peppers how hot are jalapenos”
”Alexa, ask Wicked Peppers how hot is a jalapeno pepper”
”Alexa, ask Wicked Peppers how hot is a ghost pepper”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.

des: Find out how hot common peppers are based on the Scoville scale.
